start.message:
Welcome to the Zo community â€” a dynamic platform where you can chat, create, and collaborate. Zo is an AI-powered group chat app that allows you to interact with friends, build custom AI mini-apps, and earn rewards for active participation.

Available Commands:
	/start - Open the Mini App
	/leaderboard - View the current leaderboard
	/tasks - See recent tasks and updates
	/invite - Invite your friends to earn rewards
